thread.title: Miley Cyrus Will Perform Naked in Concert, Covered in Milk
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus Will Perform Naked in Concert, Covered in Milk

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Miley Cyrus Will Perform Naked in Concert, Covered in Milk
text:
Miley Cyrus getting her kit off isn't exactly shocking news, but this might be.
She's planning a totally naked gig, which means if you want to attend, the dress code is your birthday suit.
Oh fuck..!!! @mileycyrus is planning a show where her, the band ( us ) and the audience are all COMPLETELY naked with milk ( well white stuff that looks like milk) is being being spewed everywhere .. It's a video ( in the works) for #mileycyrusandherdeadpetz song The Milky Milky Milk... @stevendrozd @derek_levi_brown @mileycyrus @katyweaver @spacefacemusic @rockworth @leochandler @fantastic_ley @jgeeezus @zacharyancox @alphachanneling @mugglinstagram @monamuseum @happyhippiefdn @waynez__world @weirddestiny @drc3p0 @damienhirst #flaminglips #waynecoyne #mileycyrusandherdeadpetz #theflaminglips
A photo posted by Wayne Coyne (@waynecoyne5) on Oct 13, 2015 at 9:14am PDT
 Wayne Coyne, lead singer of the Flaming Lips posted on Instagram: "Oh f**k..!!! @mileycyrus is planning a show where her, the band (us) and the audience are all COMPLETELY naked with milk (well white stuff that looks like milk) is being being spewed everywhere.
"It's a video (in the works) for #mileycyrusandherdeadpetz song 'The Milky Milky Milk'."
Cyrus collaborated with Coyne on her new single 'Dooo It!' and the band will be joining her on tour.
The singer recently released a surprise album, Miley Cyrus & Her Dead Petz , which she has streamed for free.
